title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together.
Drain pasta, mix with pancetta and garlic.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture quickly.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Fry onions in butter until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer 5 more minutes and serve with rice.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef strips cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles.
instructions: Cook noodles and set aside.
Sear beef strips and remove from pan.
Fry onion and mushrooms until golden.
Stir in flour, then add sour cream.
Return beef to the pan and simmer 5 minutes.
Serve over noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple Neapolitan pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220째C (430째F).
Spread olive oil and tomato slices on dough.
Add mozzarella slices evenly.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil and serve hot.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: An assortment of fresh nigiri, sashimi, and sushi rolls served with soy sauce and wasabi.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season with vinegar.
Slice fish into thin strips.
For nigiri: shape rice, place fish on top.
For rolls: place rice on nori, add fillings, roll tightly.
Slice rolls and serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, feta cheese, olives, and olive oil.
instructions: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, and onion.
Mix in a bowl with olives.
Top with crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve chilled.

title: Falafel Wrap
summary: Crispy chickpea falafels wrapped in pita with tahini sauce, lettuce, and tomato.
instructions: Warm pita bread.
Fill with lettuce, tomato, and falafels.
Drizzle with tahini sauce.
Wrap tightly and serve.

title: Ramen Bowl
summary: Japanese noodle soup with miso broth, pork slices, egg, and vegetables.
instructions: Cook ramen noodles and set aside.
Heat miso broth in a pot.
Add noodles, pork slices, and vegetables.
Top with half a boiled egg and spring onions.
Serve hot.

title: Tacos al Pastor
summary: Mexican street tacos with marinated pork, pineapple, and cilantro on corn tortillas.
instructions: Marinate pork in chili paste overnight.
Grill pork slices until charred.
Warm tortillas and fill with pork.
Top with pineapple and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A rich chocolate cake with a warm, gooey molten center, served with ice cream.
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk eggs and sugar until fluffy.
Fold in flour, then add melted chocolate mixture.
Pour into ramekins and bake at 200째C (390째F) for 10 minutes.
Serve immediately with vanilla ice cream.
